nodes.text: Star Wars Encyclopedia is a series of canon reference booklets published by De Agostini in Spanish and by Altaya in French. The collection started to be published in 2020.
The definitive collection of the greatest galactic saga of all time!
Discover all the secrets of the Galaxy in an original collection. The most complete work ever published on Star Wars with all the information organized and updated.

You can now have the most complete encyclopedia of the Star Wars universe and have in hand RICHLY ILLUSTRATED PLANS, DRAWINGS, AND CONTENT for analysis from different perspectives of everything you need to know about STAR WARS, the work that has revolutionized science fiction forever.
